lt_pay_ios_incomplete_order: App Store is processing your pending order. Please try again later.
lt_login_common_bind_guest_tips: This guest account is not bound, and its gaming data cannot be retrieved once you switch to another account, we highly suggest you bind the guest account first to avoid data lost.

lt_login_common_has_bind_tips: The login account has been bound to another game account, please use a different account to process binding.
lt_login_common_switch_account_continue: You are going to switch current account, are you sure you want to continue?
lt_login_common_bind_current_account: Current login account is bound to other game account, do you want to switch account? Beware! If current game account is not bound, all your gaming data and progress will be lost.
